meta.name: Emotion Sunrise
meta.description: 晨曦情感风格，金橙配色，适合正能量文章、温暖故事

base.container: background-color: #fffbf0; color: #5c4a37; font-family: 'PingFang SC', 'Microsoft YaHei', sans-serif; font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.85; padding: 22px;

header_window.style: background: linear-gradient(135deg, #fbbf24, #f59e0b); border-radius: 0 0 16px 16px; padding: 12px 24px; margin-bottom: 26px; box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(245, 158, 11, 0.3);

headings.h2: background: linear-gradient(90deg, #fbbf24, #d97706); -webkit-background-clip: text; -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent; background-clip: text; font-size: 22px; font-weight: 700; margin: 28px 0 16px; text-align: center;
headings.h3: color: #d97706; font-size: 17px; font-weight: 600; margin: 20px 0 12px; padding: 6px 16px; background: linear-gradient(90deg, #fef3c7, #fde68a); border-radius: 20px; display: inline-block;
headings.h1: background: linear-gradient(90deg, #fbbf24, #d97706); -webkit-background-clip: text; -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent; background-clip: text; font-size: 22px; font-weight: 700; margin: 28px 0 16px; text-align: center;
headings.h4: font-size: 15px; font-weight: bold; margin-bottom: 8px; color: #57606a; margin-top: 20px;

blocks.code_block: background-color: #fffbeb; color: #78350f; padding: 16px; border-radius: 12px; margin: 18px 0; border: 2px solid #fbbf24;
blocks.quote_tip: background-color: #fef3c7; border-left: 4px solid #f59e0b; color: #92400e; padding: 14px 20px; margin: 18px 0; border-radius: 0 10px 10px 0;
blocks.quote_warning: background-color: #fef2f2; border-left: 4px solid #f87171; color: #991b1b; padding: 14px 20px; margin: 18px 0; border-radius: 0 10px 10px 0;
blocks.hr: border: 0; height: 2px; background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, #fbbf24, #f59e0b, transparent); margin: 34px 0;
blocks.quote_note: background-color: #e8f4fd; border-left: 4px solid #0969da; color: #0c3d6a; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px; border-radius: 0 6px 6px 0;
blocks.quote_info: background-color: #def7ff; border-left: 4px solid #58a6ff; color: #0c447a; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px; border-radius: 0 6px 6px 0;
blocks.quote_default: background-color: #f6f8fa; border-left: 4px solid #57606a; color: #57606a; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px; border-radius: 0 6px 6px 0;
blocks.details: background-color: #f6f8fa; border: 1px solid #d0d7de; border-radius: 6px; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px;
blocks.summary: font-weight: bold; cursor: pointer; color: #0969da; margin-bottom: 8px;

media.image_placeholder: background-color: #fef3c7; border: 2px dashed #f59e0b; color: #d97706; padding: 26px; text-align: center; margin: 20px 0; border-radius: 16px;
media.image: max-width: 100%; height: auto; display: block; margin: 15px 0; border-radius: 4px;

footer.style: margin-top: 45px; padding: 22px; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #fef3c7, #fde68a); border-radius: 16px; text-align: center; border: 2px solid #fbbf24;

math.inline: background-color: #f6f8fa; padding: 2px 6px; border-radius: 4px; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-style: italic;
math.block: background-color: #f6f8fa; padding: 15px; border-radius: 6px; text-align: center; margin: 15px 0; overflow-x: auto; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif;
